title: Social Media Manager
description: Plan, create, and manage brand social media that drives real results—strategy, content, analytics, and client acquisition.

title: Content Writer (SEO Writer)
description: Write search-friendly content that ranks and converts—keyword research, outlines, drafts, and optimization.

title: Copywriter (Direct Response)
description: Write words that sell—landing pages, ads, emails, and offers that convert readers to customers.

title: SEO Specialist
description: Help websites earn organic traffic with technical fixes, content strategy, and authority building.

title: PPC / Ads Manager (Google/Meta)
description: Plan and run paid ads campaigns that profit—targeting, creatives, testing, and reporting.

title: Email Marketing Specialist
description: Plan, write, and optimize email campaigns that nurture, launch, and convert—without spammy tactics.

title: Web Designer (No-Code / WordPress)
description: Design and build clean websites with no-code tools and WordPress—structure, UX, and conversion-focused pages.

title: WordPress Developer (More Technical)
description: Build and customize WordPress sites—themes, plugins, performance, and clean implementation.

title: Shopify / E-commerce Builder
description: Build and optimize Shopify stores—theme tweaks, product pages, checkout, and growth experiments.

title: Video Editor (Short-form + YouTube)
description: Edit engaging videos for creators and brands—hooks, pacing, subtitles, and story.

title: UGC Creator (Brand Content)
description: Make authentic content for brands—product demos, reviews, and short-form videos that feel like real life.

title: Affiliate Marketer / Niche Site Builder
description: Build content sites that earn affiliate commissions—keywords, helpful content, and monetization.

title: Blogger / AdSense Publisher
description: Publish helpful content and monetize with ads—topic selection, writing systems, and traffic growth.

title: Online Course Creator
description: Teach what you know—plan courses, produce lessons, and sell honestly with student-first outcomes.

title: Community Manager / Discord Moderator
description: Build healthy online communities—moderation, events, guidelines, and member experience.

title: Virtual Assistant (Tech-Forward VA)
description: Support teams with systems, content, and coordination—organized, reliable, and tech-savvy.

title: Sales Development Rep (Remote SDR)
description: Book qualified meetings for sales teams—prospecting, outreach, and pipeline discipline.

title: Data Analyst (Entry-Level Remote Track)
description: Turn messy data into clear insights—SQL, spreadsheets, dashboards, and communication.
